messagebundle.msg: Put a JavaScript console on your iGoogle. You can execute javascript code, render HTML and generate an iGoogle Gadget.
The result of javascript will be shown here.
You can put any text here using jsconsole.log("msg").
Press the Replace HTML button to replace this text with the HTML in the current text box. Note: All script tags will be ignored via the limitation of innerHTML.
Press the Generate gadget button to generate an iGoogle Gadget based on the HTML (and optionally the script) you specified in the settings tab.
Make a bookmarklet from the current text. ATTENTION: if a semi-colon at the end of statement is missing, your bookmarklet should not work.
You should erase __MODULE_ID__.gmodules.com at this page when you remove this gadget. Otherwise the saved texts are possibly stolen by another gadget.

The Save Texts feature will be deprecated in the near future. Please backup your texts and turn off the Save Texts setting. Afterwards, I recommend you to erase __MODULE_ID__.gmodules.com at this page
All labels are broken because of an iGoogle's bug. Sorry for inconvinience.
